dc.title: The Accelerator Division of Fermilab
dc.description: The Accelerator Division provides the expertise to deliver reliably and cost effectively particle beams to qualified researchers conducting basic research at the frontiers of high-energy physics and related disciplines operates; maintains and improves the existing Fermilab accelerator complex and beam lines conducts particle beam physics research; develops, designs and builds the accelerators and subsystems required to advance the field
